evidence.claim: H4B Chelsea utilizes AWS cloud services for scalable infrastructure.
The company supports HL7 and FHIR for healthcare interoperability.
Integration patterns include interfaces for EHR systems using APIs.
H4B Chelsea emphasizes HIPAA compliance in their healthcare solutions.
Utilization of Kafka for data streaming in real-time health applications.

icp.icp_reason: No specific use cases on X12 transactions were identified on their site.
